gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components
Class AxisInfo

java.lang.Object
  gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components.AxisInfo

public class AxisInfo
extends java.lang.Object

This class groups all of the information about an axis into one object. The class contains the "world coordinates" minimum and maximum, the label, and units. This simple class has no set methods, all info must be set by the constructor.

See Also:
IVirtualArray

LINEAR

public static final int LINEAR

See Also:
Constant Field Values

TRU_LOG

public static final int TRU_LOG
1 - This constant in selects tru-logarythmic display mode for the axis specified. Tru-log scaling follows the rules of traditional logarythmic scaling.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

PSEUDO_LOG

public static final int PSEUDO_LOG
2 - This constant in selects pseudo-logarithmic display mode for the axis specified. Pseudo-log maps a linear region to a logarythmic scale where the lowest linear value is mapped to one on the log scale.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

getScale

public int getScale()
Returns scale type of the axis. This value will be either LINEAR, TRU_LOG, or PSEUDO_LOG.
